config.script:
# Set the currPage custom property, which controls which ahu is displayed.
	
	self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Unit Controls").custom.currPage = 'AHU1'

# Set the currPage custom property, which controls which ahu is displayed.
	
	self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Unit Controls").custom.currPage = 'AHU2'

# If the roof display is open and the user clicks on the background, close
	# the roof display.
		
	if self.parent.getChild("Info Cont").getChild("Roof").getChild("Roof").position.display == True:
		self.parent.getChild("Info Cont").getChild("Roof").getChild("Roof").position.display = False

# Display the roof display.
		
	self.getSibling("Roof").position.display = not self.getSibling("Roof").position.display
